text: Chongji may be *McCune–Reischauer Romanization of the pen name of Joseon Dynasty aristocrat Jeong Do-jeon *McCune–Reischauer Romanization of Jongji-ri, village in Hansan-myeon, Seocheon-gun, Chungcheongnam-do *Revised Romanization of the pen name of Unified Silla period Confucian scholar Seol Chong
title: Chongji
